summary: Meet your old friend Gork , help him achieve his dream , reunite him with his old love ...
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]

                                 [/size][size=6]
                                          [color=#d5a6bd]Gork[/color][size=5]              
[size=2]                                                                                                        [/size][/size][/size]                                       
                                                                                                   
                                                                                         
                                                                                              
                                                                                                       BY TERSO




                                                                                     [color=#c27ba0][b]REUNITE TWO STRANGE LOVERS 
                                                                            DISCOVER THE SECRET OF THE OLD BEGGAR
                                                                                    AND CONTINUE YOUR ADVENTURE
                                                                               WITH THE STORY OF THE ORIGINAL MOD .[/b][/color]


[color=#fce5cd][size=3]        

                                   This mod needs Bandits Glory (hearts and fire) or (hearts and sword) .[/size][/color]
[color=#fce5cd][size=3]                                             [/size][/color]




 
[img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/63088-1-1424854230.png[/img]
[color=#fce5cd][size=3]Just met your old friend GORK [/size][/color][color=#fce5cd][size=3][color=#fce5cd][size=3]at the solitude docks , he just arrived from[/size][/color] Solthteim with some gifts and a strange letter ...[/size][/color]
author: Terso
